customerType.newCustomer: I want to be a new customer

loginCard.title: Log in to Lobster
loginCard.description: Please, enter your email and password to access your Lobster account.

ABOUTUS.confirmMessage: I want to be made aware of offers which might be better suited for me.
ABOUTUS.alreadyExist: That email already is already registered with us, please try a different email address

footer.availability: Monday to Saturday from 9 am to 9 pm (Canaries: 8 am to 8 pm)

DELIVERYADDRESS.confirmAddressMessage: Billing address is the same address
DELIVERYADDRESS.confirmSameDeliveryAddress: Delivery address is the same address

purchasePlan.thankYouSubtitle: Your order has been placed successfully. We have sent a confirmation email to
purchasePlan.thankYouSubtitleEnd: If you have not received it, please check your spam folder.
purchasePlan.confirmIdentityDescription: For legal reasons we need to confirm the identity of our customers, so we'll need you to send us a photo of your ID.
purchasePlan.confirmIdentityDescription1: You can do it now by attaching it here:
purchasePlan.sendToEmail: Or send it to us at:
purchasePlan.confirmIdentityFooter: Once we’ve confirmed your identity, we’ll send your SIM to this address:
purchasePlan.address: María Tubau 3, Planta 5 Módulo C 28000 Madrid (Madrid)
purchasePlan.deliveryTimeCombined: If you live in mainland Spain or Balearic Islands it shouldn’t take more than a few days to arrive. If you live in the Canary Islands it may take an extra day or two.
purchasePlan.orderConfirmationMessage: We’ve sent an order confirmation email to. If you do not see the email in a few minutes, please check your junk/spam folder.
purchasePlan.signContractDescription: We’ve sent an SMS to the contact number you provided, please click on the link in the message and read and accept the contract.
purchasePlan.installationDescription: We’ll install fibre at your home with a super Wi-Fi router, for free!
purchasePlan.installationAndSimDeliveryDescription: Once we've confirmed your identity, we'll write to you to confirm the fibre installation date and, we'll send your SIM to this address:

MOBILENUMBER.cardSubTitle1: I'd like to receive a shiny new number when purchasing my plan
MOBILENUMBER.cardSubTitle2: I want to bring my existing number over to Lobster
MOBILENUMBER.currentSIM: Is your current SIM ‘pay as you go’?
MOBILENUMBER.iccIdInfo: You can be found it on the back of your SIM and is usually between 13 and 19 digits. If your ICCID number only has 9 digits, please contact Movistar (by calling 1004) for the correct number.
MOBILENUMBER.switchLabel: I am the owner of the mobile number
MOBILENUMBER.ownerDetailsLabel: About the owner of the mobile number
MOBILENUMBER.ownerDetailsSubLabel: Remember your first name, last name, and identity details must coincide with those in your current mobile provider so that we can bring your existing number over to Lobster

billingAddress.billing_address_title: Please provide us your billing address:
billingAddress.different_address: Different address from the fibre installation

fibreCoverage.instruction: Your address for the fibre installation.
fibreCoverage.tip: A useful tip is to use the address as it appears on your bank statements and utility bills in Spain. For buildings with different apartments, we do need the floor and the door number.
fibreCoverage.notFind: It looks like we can't find your address. We can call you to help check your address for coverage.
fibreCoverage.found: Lobster fibre is available at your address.
fibreCoverage.street: Great! We just need a few more details:
fibreCoverage.floor: Please select your floor and flat number
fibreCoverage.callmeText: Please leave us your contact details and we'll get intouch with you.
fibreCoverage.success: Great! Lobster fibre is available at your address.
fibreCoverage.confirmCheck: Please enter your street number or select the ‘No Number’ box
fibreCoverage.numConfirmCheck: Please enter your street number or select the ‘No Number’ box
fibreCoverage.searchAddress1: We can call you to help check your address for coverage.

yourOrder.mobilePlan_description_one: Unlimited calls & texts in Spain, to the UK and other countries
yourOrder.mobilePlan_description_two: Discount forever when you have our fibre service too
yourOrder.infoPara: The Lobster SIM card is die-cut with three SIM sizes, making it compatible with any phone.
yourOrder.fibrePlan_description_one: Ultra-fast connectivity for the ultimate online experience in your home

ORDERPLACEDCARD.cardBodyData: Unlimited calls and texts in Spain, to the UK and other countries.

paymentInformation.autoRenewDescription: You are free to stop auto-renew at any time. Your payment details will be saved so we can take payment every 28 days to auto-renew your mobile plan.
paymentInformation.title: Don’t auto-renew your plan?
paymentInformation.header: Are you sure you don’t want auto-renew your mobile plan every 28 days?
paymentInformation.description: Auto-renewing your mobile plan means you don’t need to remember every 28 days to renew your plan again, and you’ll always be able to use your plan! Remember, you are free to stop and start any time you like.

userDetails.callmeText: Please leave us your contact details and we'll get intouch with you.
